title: Treasure Magnet
summaries: The Treasure Magnet is a post-Skeletron accessory which increases the pickup range of items from 2.625 tiles to 12 tiles while equipped. When an item is within its range, before directly flying to the player, it will hover a few blocks off the ground. The Treasure Magnet has a 1/5 (20%) chance of being found in Shadow Chests in the Underworld, as well as a 1/5 (20%) chance of being found in Obsidian Lock Boxes obtained from Obsidian Crates and Hellstone Crates.
